item.title: Docs: Azura
item.description:
Azura

The Azura pyramid is adorned with the Wei Glpyh of Decay

item.title: Docs: Caer Sidi
item.description:
Caer Sidi

An ancient City mentioned in the Poem of Taliesin

item.title: Docs: Esoron
item.description:
Esoron

Esoron is the landmass that represented all of the Tinai territory prior to the destruction of the cataclysm

item.title: Docs: Ruins of Zuriel
item.description:
Ruins of Zuriel

The Ruins of Zuriel was an ancient city ruled by King Zuriel It is said to have been swallowed whole into the underworld

item.title: Docs: Shai
item.description:
Shai

The name Shai has been passed around from culture to culture to mean ‘great mother’ and generally is understood to mean the earth

item.title: Docs: Shima
item.description:
Shima

Shima is one of the moons that orbit Solinia

item.title: Docs: The Under
item.description:
The Under

The Under is a vast network of subterrainian caverns and kingdoms that sprawls under all of the Solinia. It can only be entered from Id-Kura and is guarded by a giant behemoth. The Orc races were first born here and many other darker races which clammer around in the everlasting dark
